sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'
  import { MDXTag } from '@mdx-js/tag'
  import { Playground, PropsTable } from 'docz'
import { Button } from '../../src/components'

export default class MDXContent extends React.Component {
  constructor(props) {
    super(props)
    this.layout = null
  }
  render() {
    const { components, ...props } = this.props

    return <MDXTag
             name="wrapper"
             
             components={components}>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`#Button`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`##Properties`}</MDXTag>
<PropsTable of={Button} />
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`##Basic usage`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`###Button type`}</MDXTag>
<Playground __codesandbox={`undefined`} __position={1} __code={'<label htmlFor=\"primaryType\" style={{ display: \'block\', marginTop: 10 }}>\n  primary\n</label>\n<Button name=\"primaryType\">Click me!</Button>\n<label htmlFor=\"dangerType\" style={{ display: \'block\', marginTop: 10 }}>\n  danger\n</label>\n<Button type=\"danger\" name=\"dangerType\">\n  Click me!\n</Button>\n<label htmlFor=\"successType\" style={{ display: \'block\', marginTop: 10 }}>\n  success\n</label>\n<Button type=\"success\" name=\"successType\">\n  Click me!\n</Button>'} __scope={{props: this ? this.props : props,Button}}>
  <label
    htmlFor="primaryType"
    style={{display: 'block', marginTop: 10}}
  >
    primary
  </label>
  <Button
    name="primaryType"
  >
    Click me!
  </Button>
  <label
    htmlFor="dangerType"
    style={{display: 'block', marginTop: 10}}
  >
    danger
  </label>
  <Button
    type="danger"
    name="dangerType"
  >
    Click me!
  </Button>
  <label
    htmlFor="successType"
    style={{display: 'block', marginTop: 10}}
  >
    success
  </label>
  <Button
    type="success"
    name="successType"
  >
    Click me!
  </Button>
</Playground>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`###Button size`}</MDXTag>
<Playground __codesandbox={`undefined`} __position={2} __code={'<label htmlFor=\"smallSize\" style={{ display: \'block\', marginTop: 10 }}>\n  small\n</label>\n<Button name=\"smallSize\" size=\"small\">\n  Click me!\n</Button>\n<label htmlFor=\"defaultSize\" style={{ display: \'block\', marginTop: 10 }}>\n  normal\n</label>\n<Button name=\"defaultSize\">Click me!</Button>\n<label htmlFor=\"largeSize\" style={{ display: \'block\', marginTop: 10 }}>\n  large\n</label>\n<Button size=\"large\" name=\"largeSize\">\n  Click me!\n</Button>'} __scope={{props: this ? this.props : props,Button}}>
  <label
    htmlFor="smallSize"
    style={{display: 'block', marginTop: 10}}
  >
    small
  </label>
  <Button 
    name="smallSize"
    size="small"
  >
    Click me!
  </Button>
  <label 
    htmlFor="defaultSize"
    style={{display: 'block', marginTop: 10}}
  >
    normal
  </label>
  <Button 
    name="defaultSize"
  >
    Click me!
  </Button>
  <label
    htmlFor="largeSize"
    style={{display: 'block', marginTop: 10}}
  >
    large
  </label>
  <Button 
    size="large" 
    name="largeSize"
  >
    Click me!
  </Button>
</Playground>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`###Button shape`}</MDXTag>
<Playground __codesandbox={`undefined`} __position={3} __code={'<label htmlFor=\"squareShape\" style={{ display: \'block\', marginTop: 10 }}>\n  square\n</label>\n<Button shape=\"square\" name=\"squareShape\">\n  Click me!\n</Button>\n<label htmlFor=\"roundShape\" style={{ display: \'block\', marginTop: 10 }}>\n  round/default\n</label>\n<Button name=\"roundShape\">Click me!</Button>\n<label htmlFor=\"ovalShape\" style={{ display: \'block\', marginTop: 10 }}>\n  oval\n</label>\n<Button shape=\"oval\" name=\"ovalShape\">\n  Click me!\n</Button>'} __scope={{props: this ? this.props : props,Button}}>
  <label
    htmlFor="squareShape"
    style={{display: 'block', marginTop: 10}}
  >
    square
  </label>
  <Button
    shape="square"
    name="squareShape"
  >
    Click me!
  </Button>
  <label
    htmlFor="roundShape"
    style={{display: 'block', marginTop: 10}}
  >
    round/default
  </label>
  <Button
    name="roundShape"
  >
    Click me!
  </Button>
  <label
    htmlFor="ovalShape"
    style={{display: 'block', marginTop: 10}}
  >
    oval
  </label>
  <Button 
    shape="oval"
    name="ovalShape"
  >
    Click me!
  </Button>
</Playground>
           </MDXTag>
  }
}
